pages.title: Workshop Crafting
pages.text: As the name implies the Potion Workshops main focus is the creation of powerful Potions.$(br)But you found great utility creating other things, too. With the help of the filigree and granular adjustable switches and valves you could also recreate the creation of Mud and Liquid Crystal here - way more efficient than before.$(br)$()All these recipes do not use $(l:magical_blocks/potion_workshop_reagents)Reagents$(/l).

pages.title: Lava
pages.text: The $(l:magical_blocks/lava_sponge)Lava Sponge$(/l) will not get used up, allowing you to create large amounts of Lava quickly.

pages.title: Crying Obsidian
pages.text: The $(l:general/midnight_aberration)Midnight Aberration$(/l) will not get used up.
